img_above_text:
![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(107\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/9/91/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%28107%29.png)
While you're doing this, Fast as Wind will follow you blowing gusts of wind down on you. If this hits you, it will also burn you. Avoid this while you focus on putting an end to Quick as Fire.
img_below_text:
When Quick as Fire is down, the intensity of Fast as Wind's attacks will increase. He'll now start to charge at you, sweeping down as close as possible to the ground, to hit you with his tusks. The best counter to this is a dodge, which will see him hit the ground and get his tusks stuck for a few seconds.
![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(111\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/5/5f/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%28111%29.png)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 64 from the file 'Woods_of_Ember_Walkthrough.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(107\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/9/91/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%28107%29.png)
While you're doing this, Fast as Wind will follow you blowing gusts of wind down on you. If this hits you, it will also burn you. Avoid this while you focus on putting an end to Quick as Fire."
            - Following Text: "When Quick as Fire is down, the intensity of Fast as Wind's attacks will increase. He'll now start to charge at you, sweeping down as close as possible to the ground, to hit you with his tusks. The best counter to this is a dodge, which will see him hit the ground and get his tusks stuck for a few seconds.
![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(111\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/5/5f/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%28111%29.png)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a dramatic moment from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," where the player character is engaged in a battle against the enemy "Quick as Fire." The scene shows Quick as Fire, characterized by its large, flowing mane, preparing to attack the player. This image illustrates the intense combat scenario described in the preceding and following text, where the player must avoid wind gusts and prepare for increased aggression from "Fast as Wind" once "Quick as Fire" is defeated.
